synopsis.text: Gigolo, Melon, and their friends embark on a lively hot springs retreat, seeking relaxation and amusement. However, the tranquil getaway takes an unexpected turn as Kakeru's less-than-gentlemanly behavior around the girls stirs up chaos. Meanwhile, Melon experiences a pang of loneliness as she observes Yell and Budoku sharing intimate moments with their respective owners. Adding to the commotion, Miku makes a sudden entrance in search of her owner, and a sushi food fight erupts, ensuring that this excursion will be anything but forgettable!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
